ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] =)
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Janna, welcome to that group but you ought to join The Tavernites, is a spinoff from this group. Has actual people showing interest to play together, i
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Janna, welcome to that group but you ought to join The Tavernites, is a spinoff from this group. Has actual people showing interest to play together, i will get the leader of the group to invite you........ Hey, Iewe invite her to the tavernites.......... we play on the Firiona Vie server, when some of us are online we will power level you. There are 4 of us, that i know of so far that group together...... I think you will like it, do you have all expansions? Let us know what ones you have ok? Shari (Luminye on FV)

Janna <moretta_dragonrider@...> wrote:Hi, new to the group. in fact, I'll be playing EQ for te fist time
tonight when I get home from work. I'm exciteted. =)
